resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106670</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106670</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101385</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Keepers of the Flam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wächter des Flam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gardes du Flam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Keepers do Flam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Custodi del Flam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλακες του Flam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encargados del Flam</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a portrait of an ecological study on Flammulated Owls, being conducted in Colorado by Brian Linkhart. The film investigates all aspects of the study: the science, the people, the setting, and the birds themselves. This version is condensed to 15 minutes from the original length of 38 minutes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Portrait einer ökologischen 
Untersuchung über Flammulated Eulen und geleitet wird in Kolorado von
Brian Linkhart. Der Film forscht alle Aspekte der Studie nach: 
die Wissenschaft, die Leute, die Einstellung und die Vögel 
selbst. Diese Version wird zu 15 Minuten von der ursprünglichen
Länge von 38 Minuten kondensiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une verticale d'une étude écologique sur 
des hiboux de Flammulated, étant conduit dans le Colorado par Brian 
Linkhart. Le film étudie tous les aspects de l'étude : 
la science, le peuple, la configuration, et les oiseaux 
eux-mêmes. Cette version est condensée à 15 minutes de la 
durée initiale 38 minutes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um retrato de um estudo ecological em 
corujas de Flammulated, sendo conduzido em Colorado por Brian 
Linkhart. A película investiga todos os aspectos do estudo: 
a ciência, os povos, o ajuste, e os pássaros eles mesmos. 
Esta versão é condensada a 15 minutos do comprimento original 
de 38 minutos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un ritratto di uno studio ecologico 
sui gufi di Flammulated, essendo conducendo in Colorado da Brian 
Linkhart. La pellicola studia tutte le funzioni dello studio: 
scienza, la gente, regolazione e gli uccelli essi stessi. 
Questa versione è condensata a 15 minuti dalla lunghezza 
originale di 38 minuti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα πορτρέτο μιας οικολογικής μελέτης για
τις κουκουβάγιες Flammulated, που πραγματοποιείται στο Κολοράντο
από το Brian Linkhart. Η ταινία ερευνά όλες τις 
πτυχές της μελέτης: η επιστήμη, οι άνθρωποι, η τιμή τών 
παραμέτρων, και τα πουλιά οι ίδιοι. Αυτή η έκδοση είναι 
συμπυκνωμένη σε 15 λεπτά από το αρχικό μήκος 38 λεπτών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un retrato de un estudio ecológico en los
buhos de Flammulated, siendo conducido en Colorado por Brian Linkhart.
La película investiga todos los aspectos del estudio: la 
ciencia, la gente, la configuración, y los pájaros ellos mismos. 
Esta versión se condensa a 15 minutos de la longitud original 
de 38 minutos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106670</entry>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
